hero.scan: Једноставно скенирајте QR код на вашем столу.

about.about: Са избраном кухињом, спремљеном од поклоника мора, и панорамским погледом на бескрајне плаве воде, обећавамо незаборавно искуство уживања у храни покрај океана.

bill.payment:
Da li je plaćanje u gotovini?
OK - gotovina
Otkaži - kartica

alert.oops: Упс. Нешто није у реду. Ваша порука није послата. Молимо покушајте поново.
alert.inside: Морате бити унутар ресторана да бисте позвали келнера.
alert.else: Желите ли нешто друго да поручите, уместо рачуна?
alert.enableLoc: Молимо омогућите услуге геолокације (ИЛИ ПОНОВО УЧИТАЈТЕ СТРАНИЦУ) да бисте могли позвати келнера. Нашој апликацији је потребно да провери да ли сте унутар ресторана, иначе нећете моћи позвати келнера.

page1.2: QR Codes for Beach Bars: Increasing Profits and Customer Satisfaction
page1.3: QR Codes - The Future of Beach Bar Service

page2.2: CLIENT PRESS THE BUTTON - WAITER GET IT. JUST AS EASY AS IT IS.

page3.3a: Client can directly call waiter with only clicking one button.
page3.4a: Client can request bill doing just 2 actions - scanning code and pressing button.
page3.6a: Client can instantly reorder the last drink, pressing one button.
page3.7a: Skip the back and forth: know if they're paying by card upfront. Less running around for the waiters!
page3.8a: You do not need to come to the customer first, then call the shisha guy. Waiters run fewer kilometers, clients wait less.
page3.9a: And send a waiter who speaks it like a pro!
page3.10a: Client could only call the waiter once they're inside the restaurant.
page3.11a: No complex installation needed. Each waiter simply receives their unique QR code, leading them directly to the app.

page6.3a: Simply download the app to your smartphone using the link we provide.
page6.4a: We will create a fully customized webpage for your beach bar,tailored to your specific needs.
page6.5a: We will print all the QR codes you need for your tables and umbrellas. Just let us know the quantity required.
page6.6: Affix the QR Codes to Tables
page6.6a: Attach the QR codes to your tables and/or menus. Your customers just need to scan them to access the service.
page6.7a: Enjoy satisfied clients, happy waitstaff, and increased orders!
